entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning except 50 near the Richardson mountains late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 4 May 2023
